name: aquarian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person born during the period 21 January to 19 February, who is believed to be influenced by the zodiac sign Aquarius: He's an Aquarian. My niece Kate and I are both Aquarians. See
Aquarius
More examplesFewer examplesAn Aquarian, she turned 50 at the end of January.True Aquarians are said to be friendly, creative, optimistic, and fond of science and literature. We're both Aquarians and dreamers.

belonging or relating to the zodiac sign Aquarius (= the sign for people born from 21 January to 19 February): He has the Aquarian trait of wanting to change the world. My best friend, like me, is Aquarian.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has that very Aquarian free spirit.Planning isn't really an Aquarian thing.
